about_the_game:
• "My Mustache"
"My Mustache" is a narrative game that tells a story about childhood.


Guide：
The current adaptation is not particularly perfect, so I will need some time to make it as 'perfect' as I hoped.

If the screen is not 16:9, there is a high probability of adaptation issues.
The setting of the game start interface is no use, because it has not been done at all.
If your screen is not a 16:9 screen, please move up the mouse a little bit at the START button.


If you stucked
At the beginning of the game, there is a level about "size". Please use the mouse scroll wheel ~
For other levels, there may be some small challenges, but they can all be overcome!



  • No exquisite art, only real stories
Because I don't want to influence players from a very subjective perspective, I used a lot of blank space in art, and I am very satisfied with this art style! (Although there are still those who are said to be poorly drawn, hhh)

The story is based on real personal experience, so when my friends playing this game, I feel a bit shy. Fortunately, everyone can get my story and it has given me a lot of affirmation. Thank you all here!

So I hope that after you experienced this game, you can leave comments or email me directly. I am very welcome all kinds of opinions/suggestions/affirmation!


  • Q&A

Q：Why it is called "My Mustache"?
A：The earliest story was about me rolling around in bed and injuring my chin when I was a child. Then I was taken to the hospital and got some stitches, and after removing the gauze, the thread was dangling on the side of my chin.
